relevant_communication: - Raise awareness about ATT's technological systems
goals__remit:
Advanced Track & Trace supplies industries and governments with cutting-edge authentication, identification, secure traceability tools, cybersecurity solutions and dependable third-party infrastructures to control and drastically reduce frauds and illicit practices. 
 
Advanced Track & Trace works with public authorities and international groups in all activity sectors and regions sensitive to illicit trade (alcohol, tobacco, wines and spirits, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, electronics, spare parts, food, luxury...) to protect products, supply chain and consumers. 
 
With over ten years of collaborations with governments and major international banks, Advanced Track & Trace® has become a leading player in the protection of banknotes, tax documents (tax stamps…) and sensitive documents using digital technologies and e-systems. 
 
The solutions developed by Advanced Track & Trace® are able to securely identify citizens: ID cards, visas, passports...
